title: Histogram input configuration
description: The Configuration input of an histogram

isHistogramSelectable.description: If you can select a period on histogram

multiselectable.description: If you can select several period on histogram

leftOffsetRemoveInterval.description: Left offset position of the remove-selection-button

brushHandlesHeightWeight.description: A 0 to 1 weight of the brush height. It controls the brush handles height.

chartWidth.description: Chart's width. If set to null, the chart takes the component's container width.

chartHeight.description: Chart's height. If set to null, the chart takes the component's container height

customizedCssClass.description: Css class name to use to customize a specific `arlas-histogram` component.

xAxisPosition.description: The xAxis positon : above or below the chart.

descriptionPosition.description: The start/end values positon : above or below the chart.

xTicks.description: Number of ticks in the X axis.

yTicks.description: Number of ticks in the Y axis.

xLabels.description: Number of labels in the X axis.

yLabels.description: Number of labels in the Y axis.

showXTicks.description: Whether showing the X axis ticks.m

showYTicks.description: Whether showing the Y axis ticks.

showXLabels.description: Whether showing the X axis labels.

showYLabels.description: Whether showing the Y axis labels.

showHorizontalLines.description: Whether showing the horizontal dashed lines.

paletteColors.description: Either a hex string color or a color name (in English) or a saturation interval.

ticksDateFormat.description: The date format of ticks.* Please refer to this [list of specifiers](https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format/blob/master/README.md#locale_format).

isSmoothedCurve.description: Whether the curve of an `area` chart is smoothed.
